Uses of Package
org.fluentjava.collections

Packages that use org.fluentjava.collections
org.fluentjava Package with entry points to most of the concepts on the subpackages. 
org.fluentjava.collections Package with extended collections. 
org.fluentjava.iterators Package with iterators that are themselves iterables. 
 

Classes in org.fluentjava.collections used by org.fluentjava
Enumerable
          Implements a enumeration protocol.
FluentList
          List that has type safe toArray, and has a fluent interface on methods.
FluentMap
          Map that has a fluent interface on methods.
FluentSet
          Set that has type safe toArray, and has a fluent interface on methods.
Pair
          Simple Pair of types F and S.
 

Classes in org.fluentjava.collections used by org.fluentjava.collections
AbstractEnumerable
          Default implementation of Enumerable.
Enumerable
          Implements a enumeration protocol.
EnumeratingException
          Exception caused when iterating over a collection through the extended collection methods, such as find, exists, collect.
ExtendedCollection
          Collection that accepts varargs for: Collection.containsAll(Collection), Collection.removeAll(Collection), Collection.retainAll(Collection), Collection.addAll(Collection).
FluentList
          List that has type safe toArray, and has a fluent interface on methods.
FluentMap
          Map that has a fluent interface on methods.
FluentSet
          Set that has type safe toArray, and has a fluent interface on methods.
ForwardingFluentList
          Wraps around any List implementation, and delegates all set methods to this ForwardingFluentList.delegateList .
ForwardingFluentMap
          Wraps around any Map implementation, and delegates all set methods to this ForwardingFluentMap.delegateMap .
ForwardingFluentSet
          Wraps around any Set implementation, and delegates all set methods to this ForwardingFluentSet.delegateSet .
Pair
          Simple Pair of types F and S.
